apihelp-query+pagecollectionsmetadata-su: Fetch campaign data for the campaign defined inside the page that corresponds to the given title.
apihelp-query+pagecollectionsmetadata-pa: A string containing the page title for which the campaign data will be fetched.
apihelp-query+pagecollectionsmetadata-ex: Fetch the campaign metadata, for the campaign defined inside 'TestCampaign' page
